title: What is the serif-font in this image with the large spaces?
content:
Hi, I am wondering what the serif-font in this image is. I guess the large inner spaces in the O’s and G’s and the high position of the horizontal line in the e’s are ways of identifying it...

http://typophile.com/files/23092008.jpg
